Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee or ranged attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

Filling your weapon with the power of the elements, you lash out with barely-contained eldritch power. Make an attack. If it hits, it deals weapon damage as normal plus one of the following effects, based on your active element: Air If the target is wearing metal armor, wielding a metal shield, or wielding a weapon mostly composed of metal, you gain a +4 bonus on your attack roll. Earth If your attack hits, the target must succeed at a Will save or become sickened for one round. Fire If your attack hits, the target must succeed at a Reflex save or catch on fire for [[1d4]] rounds.
